languages.text: "Отчего ты столь подозрительно улыбаешься? Твои цвета... причудливо пляшут, когда я рядом".
"Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."
languages.original_text: "Отчего ты столь подозрительно улыбаешься? Твои цвета... причудливо пляшут, когда я рядом".

traits.locale_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你为什么笑得这么古怪？你的颜色……当我靠近的时候，它变得如此古怪、无常。”
languages.original_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."

traits.locale_text: “你为什么笑得这么古怪？你的颜色……当我靠近的时候，它变得如此古怪、无常。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Pourquoi me souriez-vous de la sorte ? Vos couleurs dansent de façon si... saugrenue quand je suis dans les parages. »
languages.original_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi me souriez-vous de la sorte ? Vos couleurs dansent de façon si... saugrenue quand je suis dans les parages. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué sonríes de forma tan sospechosa? Tus colores... bailan muy juguetones cuando estoy cerca».
languages.original_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué sonríes de forma tan sospechosa? Tus colores... bailan muy juguetones cuando estoy cerca».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「どうしてそんなに不審な笑みを浮かべているんです？あなたの色は...近づくと、とても気まぐれに踊る」
languages.original_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."

traits.locale_text: 「どうしてそんなに不審な笑みを浮かべているんです？あなたの色は...近づくと、とても気まぐれに踊る」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Warum lächelt Ihr so misstrauisch? Eure Farben ... sie tanzen so heiter, wenn ich in der Nähe bin."
languages.original_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."

traits.locale_text: "Warum lächelt Ihr so misstrauisch? Eure Farben ... sie tanzen so heiter, wenn ich in der Nähe bin."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."

languages.text: "Neye gülüyorsun öyle? Ben gelince... Renklerinde acayip kıpırdanmalar oluyor."
languages.original_text: "Why are you smiling so suspiciously? Your colours... they dance so whimsically when I am near."

traits.locale_text: "Neye gülüyorsun öyle? Ben gelince... renklerinde acayip kıpırdanmalar oluyor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
